Vietnam, Philippines seal deals on South China Sea securityVietnam and the Philippines agreed on Tuesday to boost cooperation among their coastguards and to prevent untoward incidents in the South China Sea, in an announcement during a state visit by President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:54:16 GMT KLJJFXA7EJMHFKDPXUWFW7SPBI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-philippines-seal-deals-south-china-sea-security-2024-01-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Stocks in Asia slip as China property sector worries weighAsian shares fell on Tuesday, hurt by the court-ordered liquidation of property giant China Evergrande while rising geopolitical tensions propped up oil prices and kept a lid on risk appetite ahead of the Federal Reserve's meeting Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:47:50 GMT ZLAV624D6JJ5FBB7LIHIYS4XBU https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-30/Ankur Banerjee市场
Hong Kong leaders start legislative push to tighten national security lawsHong Kong's leader confirmed on Tuesday his intention to pass fresh national security laws soon, building on sweeping legislation Beijing imposed on the city in 2020, saying the city has the constitutional responsibility to impose the new laws. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:18:18 GMT GMDHVRQJYZLDLC752YVPL7BH4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-leaders-start-legislative-push-tighten-national-security-laws-2024-01-30/Jessie Pang世界中国
Toyota keeps crown as world's top-selling automaker in 2023Toyota Motor sold a record 11.2 million vehicles in 2023, it said on Tuesday, taking the crown as the world's top-selling automaker for a fourth straight year. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:07:59 GMT 75B547QBFBJ2VGW7MWMQZTRGOU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/toyota-keeps-crown-worlds-top-sales-automaker-2023-2024-01-30/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: LME targets Hong Kong as option for warehouse expansionThe London Metal Exchange (LME) is studying Hong Kong as a location to expand its global metal warehouse network, five sources with knowledge of the matter said, hopeful success there might open the door to mainland China, its ultimate target. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 01:02:56 GMT L7T3BNECP5P6ZJWUGH4WD4I22M https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/lme-targets-hong-kong-option-warehouse-expansion-2024-01-30/Pratima Desai市场商品
Exclusive: US disabled Chinese hacking network targeting critical infrastructure, sources sayThe U.S. government in recent months launched an operation to fight a pervasive Chinese hacking operation that successfully compromised thousands of internet-connected devices, according to two Western security officials and one person familiar with the matter. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:09:37 GMT 5AA7JPLD5VKIXJVULNBTQVILXM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-disabled-chinese-hacking-network-targeting-ritic-infrastruct-sources-2024-01-29/Christopher Bing, Karen Freifeld世界美国
